parameter.name: discoverChannels
parameter.label: Discover channels
parameter.description: Because each BACnet object is linked to a BACnet device, device will know associated objects. Thanks to this setting it is possible to aggregate all objects states (present values) in one place. Please note this is experimental feature and works only if device channel list is empty.

parameter.name: discoverObjects
parameter.label: Discover objects
parameter.description: Enabling this feature will look for BACnet objects which can be mapped to Thing instances. For each supported BACnet object there will be one Thing instance. Please be aware that it most of the situations it will lead to multiplication of things.

bridge-type.label: BACnet/IP bridge
bridge-type.description: The BACnet/IP bridge allows to connect devices supporting communication over BACnet/IP.

parameter-group.name: network
parameter-group.label: BACnet network
parameter-group.description: Configuration of network layer managed by BACnet.

parameter.name: localNetworkNumber
parameter.description: Identifier of network to which by default this bridge is bound.
parameter.label: Local network number

parameter.name: localDeviceId
parameter.description: Identifier of local device which is visible in BACnet network.
parameter.label: Device identifier

parameter.name: localBindAddress
parameter.description: IP address on which communications to system are expected to take place.
parameter.label: Local address

parameter.name: port
parameter.description: Port number on which to expect communication. By default 47808 (hex 0xBAC0).
parameter.label: Port number

parameter.name: broadcastAddress
parameter.description: Address used for sending BACnet broadcast messages.
parameter.label: Broadcast address

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh interval
parameter.description: Time between next poll cycles. If no value is given polling is done 1000 ms (every second).

bridge-type.label: BACnet/MSTP Bridge
bridge-type.description: The BACnet mstp bridge allows to connect devices communicating over serial interface (RS485).

parameter-group.name: network
parameter-group.label: BACnet network
parameter-group.description: Configuration of network layer managed by BACnet.

parameter-group.name: serial
parameter-group.label: Serial port settings
parameter-group.description: Settings related to physical layer of MSTP communication.

parameter.name: localNetworkNumber
parameter.description: Identifier of network to which by default this bridge is bound.
parameter.label: Local network number

parameter.name: serialPort
parameter.label: Serial port
parameter.description: Serial interface port.

parameter.name: baudRate
parameter.label: Baud rate
parameter.description: Baud rate for serial connection.

parameter.name: parity
parameter.description: Parity settings determine detection of frames and communication over serial port.
parameter.label: Parity setting

options.option: 8N1: 8 data bits, no parity, 1 stop bit
8N1: 8 data bits, no parity, 2 stop bits
8E1: 8 data bits, even parity, 1 stop bit
8N1: 8 data bits, odd parity, 1 stop bit

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh interval
parameter.description: Time between next poll cycles. If no value is given polling is done 1000 ms (every second).

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.description: Communication timeout in milliseconds under which devices should answer.
parameter.label: Timeout

parameter.name: segTimeout
parameter.description: Maximum time between next segments of segmented communication frame.
parameter.label: Segmentation timeout
